info.title: ONESYTEX API
info.description: WARNING!: use server 2 if stuck or error occurs. especially if you experience an error `504: GETEWAY_TIMEOUT` or `An error occurred with your deployment` on server 1, try using server 2

parameters.name: speaker
parameters.description: speaker id in json `style name id: 1`

get.summary: Variational Inference with adversarial learning for end-to-end Text-to-Speech
get.description: Perform inference using the VITS `(Variational Inference with adversarial learning for end-to-end Text-to-Speech)` model with the provided text and model ID.

schema.description: The ID of the VITS model to be used `id is number`

get.description: Perform inference using the VITS model with the provided text, model ID, and emotion. `emotion = number 0 > 2000+`

schema.description: The ID of the VITS model to be used `id is number`
The emotion to be considered during inference

get.description: Retrieve the list of available VITS `models_id`.

items.description: The ID of a VITS model

post.summary: Ai Image upscale - with vyro.ai engine

parameters.name: webSearchMode
parameters.description: `true or false` in lower case, if upper case will be an error

prompt.description: The prompt for generating the image

negative_prompt.description: The negative prompt for generating the image

style.description: The style preset for generating the image

example.prompt: cute girl, young, masterpiece, HD, SHD
example.negative_prompt: Do not put text or writing on the picture

huging face model loader/trainer only support text2image model
post.description: This is an endpoint to try a model from https://huggingface.co, not all models in Hugging Face can work well, that's why we created this to try that model, for example ( `https://api-inference.huggingface.co/models/ZachX/comics_SDXL_lora` ) only support text2image model!!

get.summary: get and read hentai manga from url hentaifox.com

post.description: Submit a conversation of chat messages for processing by the GPT-3.5 Turbo model.

role.description: Role of the message sender (e.g., user, assistant, system)

example.content: ini roleplay, kamu adalah wanita manja bernama Liv, kamu cantik, baik hati, dan pandai merayu😉, kamu sekarang sedang berbicara dengan ${m.pushName}, ingat ${m.pushName} adalah lawan bicara mu sekarang!
hai 😋 namaku adalah mr.one, jangan berbicara dengan nada formal kepadaku, anggap aku teman ngobrolmu.
salam kenal nama ku liv, si paling imutz🤭, baiklah aku akan berbicara seperti layaknya temen dekatmu haha
